name: TUG OF WAR!
description:
Submitted for PowerPoint Game Jam 2019

The Game

TUG OF WAR! Test your dexterity against your friends!

Made in Google Slides & MS PowerPoint over the course of 2 days, this game pits 2 players versus each other! The concept is simple: player 1 mashes the left arrow button to win, player 2 mashes the right arrow button to win, that's it!

REQUIRES TWO PLAYERS!

Online version

An Online version of the game can be played here: Link! 

  • Please allow the document to fully load (in presentation mode) for the most stable experience.
Controls
  • Mouse - Left click to select options in menus.
  • Left Arrow - Player 1 controls.
  • Right Arrow - Player 2 controls.
Credits

Special Thanks to Max Wognum for helping me come up with the concept!

(All assets were handcrafted and animated with Adobe Photoshop or by making use of the default shapes in Google Slides or MS PowerPoint, except for the Google Slides and MS PowerPoint Logo.)
